Emergency & Reports Volunteer Support Safety & Assistance User & App Settings
Home My Reports Volunteer Alerts Safety Features Help & Support Profile Logout
User Name +91 XXXXXXXXXX Location Map (Coming Soon) You need to be a volunteer to access this section
Feature icon Report emergencies, send media/voice and get immediate assistance. View your past emergency reports and their status. Find nearby volunteer help for non-emergency situations. Receive alerts about nearby emergencies you can help with. Find nearby hospitals, police stations, and fire stations. Important emergency numbers and contact information. View and update your personal information and volunteer status.
Logout Are you sure you want to logout? Exit App Are you sure you want to exit? Logging out...
Emergency SOS button
Your Location Awaiting location information… Zoom in Zoom out Nearby Medical Police Nearby Emergency Services Fire Loading nearby emergency services… %.1f km away Emergency services loaded Error loading some services
Waiting for location... Center on current location
Logout Cancel Logging out… Successfully logged out Logout error: %s Are you sure you want to logout? You will need to sign in again to use the app. Don\'t ask me again
Personal Information
Contact Name Contact Phone Relationship
Volunteer Status Register as a volunteer to help others during emergencies Volunteers may receive notifications about nearby emergencies where they can provide assistance.
Settings Notifications Privacy & Location Appearance Emergency Settings Data Management
Save Profile Profile saved successfully %s will be implemented soon
This field is required Invalid phone number Edit Profile Update Profile Loading profile… Profile updated successfully Failed to update profile Could not connect to server Emergency Contact Emergency Contact Number
Location Settings Location Sharing Allow the app to access your location Reporting Privacy Anonymous Reporting Keep my identity private when reporting incidents Data and Visibility Data Collection Allow collection of usage data to improve service Profile Visibility Make my profile visible to emergency responders Privacy settings saved Location Permission RescueReach needs location permission to send emergency alerts and help responders locate you during emergencies. Location permission granted Location sharing disabled. Location services won\'t work. Anonymous reporting enabled Anonymous reporting disabled Data collection enabled Data collection disabled Profile visible to emergency responders Profile hidden from emergency responders Error: User not logged in
Media Sharing Allow the app to access and share photos and videos during emergencies Media sharing is now enabled Media sharing is now disabled Media Permission Required We need camera and storage permissions to enable sharing photos and videos during emergencies. Without these permissions, the app cannot send visual information to emergency services. Camera and storage permissions granted Camera and storage permissions are needed for media sharing
Emergency Settings Emergency Alerts Send alerts to your emergency contact during emergencies Emergency alerts are now enabled Emergency alerts are now disabled Location sharing is now enabled Location sharing is now disabled
Appearance settings saved Emergency settings saved Data management settings saved
Theme Light Mode Dark Mode System Default Font Size Small Large Default Accessibility High Contrast Mode Increase contrast for better readability> High contrast mode enabled High contrast mode disabled Default Medium Large This is a sample text to demonstrate how your selected font size will appear throughout the app. Theme changed. Restart app to apply all changes. Font size changed. Restart app to apply all changes. Restart Now
SOS Options Quick SOS Enable quick SOS by triple-pressing the power button Share Location in Emergency Automatically share your location when sending SOS Alert Emergency Contacts Send SMS alert to your emergency contact during SOS Emergency Message Message Template Save Template Message template saved Template cannot be empty I need help! This is an emergency. My current location is: SMS Permission RescueReach needs SMS permission to notify your emergency contacts during an emergency. SMS permission granted Alert contacts disabled. SMS permission required. SMS permission required for this feature Location permission required for this feature Quick SOS enabled Quick SOS disabled Location sharing during emergency enabled Location sharing during emergency disabled Alert contacts during emergency enabled Alert contacts during emergency disabled Test SOS Feature Use this button to test the SOS feature and verify your settings. This will create a test emergency alert. Your emergency contact will receive an SMS if enabled. Test SOS Feature Now Test SOS Feature This will create a real emergency entry in the system and notify your emergency contact if enabled. Are you sure you want to proceed? Proceed Sending test SOS alert… Test SOS successfully sent! Emergency ID: %1$s Test SOS failed: %1$s
Backup and Restore Auto Backup Automatically backup your data daily No backup yet Last backup: %1$s Backup Now Backup completed successfully Data Export
Backup Create a backup of your data Last backup: %1$s Backup created successfully
Data Options Clear Saved Data Remove all your profile data while keeping your account Permanently delete your account and all data Clear Data Data cleared successfully Failed to clear data: %1$s Confirm Account Deletion Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? All your data will be permanently lost. Account deleted successfully Failed to delete account: %1$s Export My Data Download a copy of all your data in JSON format Export started… Export completed successfully Danger Zone Clear Local Data Delete My Account Clear All Local Data This will clear all locally stored data. Your account will remain intact. This action cannot be undone. Clear Local data cleared Delete Account This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone. Delete Deleting account… Account deleted successfully Error deleting account: %1$s Automatic backups enabled Automatic backups disabled Backup failed: %1$s Storage Permission RescueReach needs storage permission to export your data to a file. Cannot export data without storage permission Export completed. File saved to:\n%1$s Export failed: %1$s Failed to clear data: %1$s Final Confirmation App Version: %s To confirm deletion, please type \"DELETE\" in all caps: Type DELETE to confirm Confirm Delete DELETE Confirmation text does not match This action is permanent and cannot be undone! RescueReach Data Export This file contains your exported RescueReach data. Share data via
Notification Permission RescueReach needs permission to send you notifications about emergencies and important alerts. Grant Permission Notifications disabled. You won\'t receive emergency alerts.
Sending an emergency alert will notify nearby responders and your emergency contact.
Send Now

Report #%s Unknown Last update: %s Emergency Services Your emergency has been received. Help is being organized. Help is on the way to your location. This emergency has been resolved. Your emergency is being processed. Close Minimize Your emergency has been reported and we are looking for responders in your area. Your emergency has been received by responders who are organizing assistance. Help is on the way to your location. Please stay where you are if safe to do so. This emergency has been resolved. Thank you for using RescueReach. The status of your emergency is unknown. Please check back later for updates. Cancel Emergency? Are you sure you want to cancel this emergency? Only do this if the emergency has been resolved or was reported in error.
